code: export function getAppConfig(configs){var network=process.env.REACT_APP_NETWORK;if(!network)return configs.testnet;var config=configs[network];if(!config){throw new Error("No configuration found for network ".concat(network));}return config;}export function configKeplr(config){return{chainId:config.chainId,chainName:config.chainName,rpc:config.rpcUrl,rest:config.httpUrl,bech32Config:{bech32PrefixAccAddr:"".concat(config.addressPrefix),bech32PrefixAccPub:"".concat(config.addressPrefix,"pub"),bech32PrefixValAddr:"".concat(config.addressPrefix,"valoper"),bech32PrefixValPub:"".concat(config.addressPrefix,"valoperpub"),bech32PrefixConsAddr:"".concat(config.addressPrefix,"valcons"),bech32PrefixConsPub:"".concat(config.addressPrefix,"valconspub")},currencies:[config.token],feeCurrencies:[config.token],stakeCurrency:config.token,gasPriceStep:{low:config.gasPrice/2,average:config.gasPrice,high:config.gasPrice*2},bip44:{coinType:118},coinType:118,features:["stargate",'ibc-transfer','cosmwasm']};}
